pkgmetadata.longdescription: Chromatographic File Converter // Reads chromatograms from binary formats into R objects. Currently supports conversion of 'Agilent ChemStation', 'Agilent MassHunter', 'Shimadzu LabSolutions', 'ThermoRaw', and 'Varian Workstation' files as well as various text-based formats. In addition to its internal parsers, chromConverter contains bindings to parsers in external libraries, such as 'Aston' https://github.com/bovee/aston, 'Entab' https://github.com/bovee/entab, 'rainbow' https://rainbow- api.readthedocs.io/, and 'ThermoRawFileParser' https://github.com/compomics/ThermoRawFileParser.
